entries.femaleVariant: Hello, Night City! As always, Your Business is My Business!
Today we crack open and dissect Moore Technologies, the industry leader in full-body conversion.
Not long ago, Moore released its newest class of high-grade implants – the Breithorn-K titanium skull, Eiger-T bone series and the Hausstock-W arm series.
Meanwhile, their first major success continues to rake in steady sales. The Liskamm-C immunological override system has proven an essential buy for cyberware enthusiasts everywhere.
Yet just last year, Moore Technologies was rocked by allegations that – relative to competitors – their implants greatly accelerate the effects of cyberpsychosis.
But the PR and legal teams of the Swiss giant managed to quickly stomp out that fire. The journalist who broke the story, Franz K., was found guilty of defamation and sentenced to 10 years.
All things considered, I see a bright light on the horizon for Moore Technologies in the coming years.
My recommendation? Buy now and never look back!
